description: Sets the yaw speed for this vehicle.
*ðŸš© This documentation is for the IW3 version of this function credit to Raid Gaming and has yet to be reviewed/updated for IW4.*

params.name: speed
description: The speed of the vehicle in angles per second.

params.name: acceleration
description: The acceleration of the vehicle in angles per second^2.

params.name: deceleration
description: Deceleration. If not specified, set to be equal to acceleration.

params.name: overshoot percent
description: How much to over shoot goal yaw by. Default 0.1.
